description: Yantramanav (?????????) is a Devanagari typeface family designed by Erin McLaughlin. The style and weights of Yantramanav's Devanagari were designed as a compliment to Roboto, a Latin family designed by Christian Robertson. This project is led by Erin McLaughlin, an independent typeface designer, font developer, and consultant who specializes in Indic fonts. To contribute, see github.com/erinmclaughlin/Yantramanav
